title: (x) What is the original font of "Dear Sadie"? - Dear Sarah {Patricia}
content:
This font is called “Dear Sadie” on a certain website, but I can’t find it anywhere on the web for purchase or download. Anyone know an alternate name or similar font?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219155759im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sadie_4872.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Looking for Southern Software Inc. "YoBaby Outlin" font {Uli Stiehl}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219155759/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38950 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Skanska/Swedbank/Nordea/Metro logo - 3 custom/Agenda {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219155759/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38868 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tmiller676
